title: Proof Warwick is not broken.
body:
If i lose 2 games in a row trying my hardest then he's not broken.

Game 1: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1649751201/206767056 *Defeat*

Game 2: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1649828629/206767056 *Defeat*

Game 3: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1649940615/206767056 *Defeat*

Game 4: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1650020722/206767056 *Victory*

Game 5 -unofficial critwick game-: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1650140286/206767056 *Defeat*

**Best KDA: 15/11/8**
Build paths: ~~Trailblazer Devourer~~(Skirmisher Devourer), Botrk, sunfire, frozen mallet 
So far i've had difficulties killing half hp Zed and Gnar with my ult. And a Platinum ezreal who carried 22/6. Winning my first game after swapping trailblazer for skirmisher.

Conclusion: After losing 3 in a row and getting carried by a play ez (Who i did not duo with(and i'm silver))
i can conclude that Warwick is not gamebreakingly overpowered. and in fact might be more difficult to play than lead on by forum goers.

*Not once did my ult instakill a person. Even a glass cannon zed.
